meanings.definition: A young person, especially a young man.
meanings.sent1: The younkers played soccer in the park.
meanings.sent2: The younkers in the neighborhood often ride their bikes together.
meanings.sent3: The younkers giggled as they tried to bake cookies for the first time.
meanings.sent4: The younkers blossomed into responsible adults over the years.
meanings.sent5: The younkers' energy was contagious, brightening up the room.

meanings.sent1: The farm had a litter of younkers that were full of energy.
meanings.sent2: The younkers frolicked in the meadow under the warm sun.
meanings.sent3: The younkers of the zoo put on a playful show for the visitors.
meanings.sent4: The younkers of the forest scampered around, exploring their surroundings.
meanings.sent5: The younkers' innocence and curiosity charmed all who saw them.
